name: egg (spinie1)
description:
Submission to Weekly Game Jam's "Unusual Equipment" jam

                                                                           controlls    

                                                         left click\hold : shoot eggs

                                                             arrow keys : move

               

you're cube dude needing to kill off other cube dudes in hopes of once giving money to the big big big big big cube dude to then fight the big big big big big cube dude but you don't have a normal weapon ... you have an egg 

 (yea i know its  cheesy but i came up with the idea and wondered how i would integrate the theme of this game jam so eggs was the only way)
